Spokeo | devops engineering | Full-Time | Pasadena, CA

We are looking for a Sr Systems Engineer (devops) who understands and embraces the devops philosophy, can work closely with dev teams and is comfortable with cloud based infrastructure. If you're excited about building big data architectures and creating a PaaS then you should talk to us.

Our tech stack includes (but not limited to):

* Dev: Ruby, Python, Perl or Go

* Config Management (ansible)

* AWS (or other cloud providers)

* CI/CD

* Docker

* Monitoring

* Spark/Hadoop/Elastic Search/Cassandra/Kafka

* Netflix OSS stack, Jenkins

* IaaS/PaaS
